price: - E, por certo, eles os afastam do caminho, enquanto supõem estar sendo guiados -
arabic: وَإِنَّهُمۡ لَيَصُدُّونَهُمۡ عَنِ ٱلسَّبِيلِ وَيَحۡسَبُونَ أَنَّهُم مُّهۡتَدُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: wa-innahum layaṣuddūnahum ʿani al-sabīli wayaḥsabūna annahum muh'tadūna
